metadata.title: Wednesday, 30th September, 2015
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    why the Government evicted the villagers from the Game Management Area (GMA) 14 in Nalusanga area in Mumbwa District without giving them an alternative place to settle;
(b)    whether the Government will provide an alternative place for the villagers to settle before they become destitute;
(c)    if so, where they will be settled; and
(d)    when they will be settled.

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs which category of foreign nationals are allowed to work under the following conditions
parts: (a)    with work permits; and
(b)    without work permits.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    when the construction of Chibende and Kafwanka Secondary Schools in Chembe Parliamentary Constituency will commence considering that the local communities have already moulded bricks; and
(b)    what other contributions towards the projects are required by the communities.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development
parts: (a)    how many dams are earmarked for construction and rehabilitation in Chasefu Parliamentary Constituency in 2015 and 2016;
(b)    what the cost of rehabilitating each dam is; and
(c)    when construction of dams at the following areas of the Constituency will commence:
(i)    Manyi; (ii)    Gumba; (iii)    Nkhanga; (iv)    Mtwalo;
(v)    Chibango; and (vi)    Munyukwa.
(a)    what measures the Government is taking to reduce the deficiency of vitamin A among the Zambian population following a statement by the World Health Organisation on the severe deficiency; and
(b)    which organisations the Government is working with to reduce the deficiency.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    why Senanga District Council has delayed in issuing title deeds to property owners who bought former council houses in Nzuli Compound; and
(b)    when the title deeds will be issued.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing how many boreholes are earmarked for sinking in Nkeyema District in 2015 and, if none, why.
Minister of Community Development, Mother and Child Health
parts: (a)    when Kwenye Health Post in Mkaika Parliamentary Constituency will be opened to the public; and
(b)    how many trained staff will be deployed to the Centre.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    what measures the Government will take to ensure a smooth flow of traffic at the junctions of the Kafue-Chawama-Makeni roads in view of the numerous shopping malls around the area; and
(b)    when the measures will be implemented.
(a)    whether the Government has any plans to promote the production of biofuel from sugarcane, cassava, palm oil switchgrass and related plants; and
(b)    if so, when the plans will be implemented. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Thanks - His Excellency the President’s Address - Motion (22nd September) - Resumption of Debate.
